answers.answer: My little one is approximately 1 pound 10 ounces 70th percentile according to doc and I'm 24 weeks..all my babies have been big tho. This is #4

question: Hey ladies !Just wondering if anyone has had their bubs measure bigger and what happened?My little man is measuring 5 weeks ahead so instead of 27 weeks he's 32 weeks.I'm a tad worried.
title: anyone's bub measuring bigger?
